projects.title: Word Counter
projects.bodyText:
- Word Counter that is used to count 
 How many Number of words in this and it works like 
 Increases as words typing increases and when deleting words decrease and
 decrease as words decrease.
 - Deployed on **vercel** using **github**.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.bodyText:
- A Calculator web app made using **React** for **All** Students. People can calculate arthemtic operations using this.
 - Deployed on **vercel** using **github**.

projects.title: Color Picker
projects.bodyText:
- An Color Picker App that is used to pick colors you want and it displays the color you click 
 - deployed on **vercel** using **Github**.

projects.title: Dummy Data
projects.bodyText:
- An Dummy Data fetched using a dummy json link.
 - Fetched using **dummyjson** and stored in table.

projects.title: Age Calculator
projects.bodyText:
- An Age Calculator App that calculates age of you by your date of birth given to it as input
 - implemented by  using  **React**.
